pageProduct.name: Schick Hydro 5 Sense Sensitive Mens Razor Kit
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schick Hydro 5 Sense Sensitive Razor Kit helps protect your skin from irritation with its 7 hydrating gel pools that hydrates throughout each shave.

Helps protect your skin from irritation

Suitable For: Sensitive skin types

Boxed Contents: 1 x handle, 1 x cartridge

Size: 1 Pack

Scent: Herbal extracts

Skin Type: Sensitive

KEY FEATURES

• 5 Ultra-Glide Blades with Skin Guards

Warnings

Blades are sharp tools, handle with care. Keep away from children.

Ingredients

Peg-115M, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Stearate, Cyclodextrin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Calendula Officinalis Flower, Camellia Sinensis Leaf, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin, Aqua.

Directions

For optimal performance change the cartridge when one or more of the gel pools appear empty.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store razors and blades in a dry environment between use.
